channel.title: Gist on Suneet Agrawal
channel.description: Recent content in Gist on Suneet Agrawal

item.title: Custom Object in UserDefaults : Swift
item.description:
This particular script will help you to store and retrieve custom class or struct objects in UserDefaults.

For further explaination on how this works, please read the article Custom Object in UserDefaults : Swift.

item.title: UISwitch Value Change Listener : Swift
item.description: This particular script will help you to implement a Value Change listener to all UISwitch and its subclasses in a clean way.

item.title: UIDatePicker Date Change Listener : Swift
item.description: This particular script will help you to implement a Date Change listener to all UIDatePicker and its subclasses in a clean way.

item.title: UITextField Text Listener : Swift
item.description: This particular script will help you to implement a Text listener to all UITextField and its subclasses in a clean way.

item.title: Typecast Android Object in Untiy
item.description:
This particular script will help you to typecast one Android/Java object into another in Unity.

For further explaination on how this works, please read the article Native Android in Unity.

item.title: Custom Android Manifest File in Unity
item.description:
This particular xml is an example of custom Android Manifest file which can be used in unity.

For further explaination on how this works, please read the article Custom Android Manifest File in Unity.

item.title: UIView ClickListener : Swift
item.description: This particular script will help you to implement a Click listener to all UIView and its subclasses in a clean way.

item.title: Native Android text sharing to Whatsapp contact in Unity
item.description:
This particular script will help you to implement a text message sharing directly to a WhatsApp contact in Unity.

For further explaination on how this works, please read the article Native Android text sharing to Whatsapp contact in Unity.

item.title: Android : Share message directly to whatsapp contact
item.description:
This particular script will help you to implement a text message sharing directly to a WhatsApp contact in Android.

For further explaination on how this works, please read the article Android : Share message directly to whatsapp contact.

item.title: Native Android image sharing in Unity using FileProvider
item.description: This particular script will help you to implement native Android image sharing using Android’s FileProvider in Unity. This is a fix for “android.os.FileUriExposedException” in Android 8 (Oreo) and above.

item.title: Native Android text sharing to particular app in Unity
item.description:
This particular script will help you to implement native Android text sharing to a particular app in Unity.

We use all the native classes of Android in Unity using AndroidJavaClass and AndroidJavaObject and perform the Android’s ACTION_SEND with EXTRA_SUBJECT and EXTRA_TEXT, and share the content to a particular app with package name.

item.title: Native Android image sharing in Unity
item.description:
This particular script will help you to implement native Android image sharing in Unity.

We use all the native classes of Android in Unity using AndroidJavaClass and AndroidJavaObject and perform the Android’s ACTION_SEND with EXTRA_SUBJECT, EXTRA_TEXT and EXTRA_STREAM. The content type is set to image/png in the below example but you can change it to any type and share other formats also.

item.title: Native Android text sharing in Unity
item.description:
This particular script will help you to implement native Android text sharing in Unity.

We use all the native classes of Android in Unity using AndroidJavaClass and AndroidJavaObject and perform the Android’s ACTION_SEND with EXTRA_SUBJECT and EXTRA_TEXT.

item.title: Native Android in Unity
item.description:
This particular script will help you to implement basic native Android in Unity.

This show an example of showing a native Android’s Toast in unity using AndroidJavaClass and AndroidJavaObject.
